channel.title: How to freeze/burn urself with axe (body spray)
channel.description:
Hey people so today i came out of the shower and i saw a huge moth, and on my desk i saw a fly swatter and axe (body spray) like anyone with commen sence would do, i took the body spray and sprayed it at full power i did it about 10 times and it had the power to keep moving so then just to torture it i didnt do it at full power just enough for me to feel its cold and for me not to see the spray coming out. and in a matter of second it died which came as a shock to me.
So when it died i tried it on my finger and after a few seconds of doing it on my finger my figer froze and a little sheet of white was on it, i wiped it off and it was back to normal (except it burned) so i got really confused and tried it on my balls and it hurt like hell (and was the most effective spot) so umm yea. :D

item.title: How to freeze/burn urself with axe (body spray)
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Waffendennis, post:5, topic:21750”]Well thats no suprise that it looks like it’s ‘frozen’.
If you keep spraying on the same spot you will get burn wounds.

On most bodysprays there are warnings too:
(Quote from Adidas bodyspray)
“SOLVENT ABUSE CAN KILL INSTANTLY”

That might look fake, but it isn’t, it could kill you :).

Basicly what a body spray does is:
It makes tiny wounds in the skin tissue, this causes the skin to scar.
This is so that the sweat can’t leave the body, it is forced to keep in the body.
Yes this does means that deospray isn’t the best for you, since sweat is a chemical substance that needs to leave your body.[/quote]

thanks but i dont think ill be stoppind though anyways ive never seen u around wussup?

Read full topic
item.source: How to freeze/burn urself with axe (body spray)

item.title: How to freeze/burn urself with axe (body spray)
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

Well thats no suprise that it looks like it’s ‘frozen’.
If you keep spraying on the same spot you will get burn wounds.

On most bodysprays there are warnings too:
(Quote from Adidas bodyspray)
“SOLVENT ABUSE CAN KILL INSTANTLY”

That might look fake, but it isn’t, it could kill you :).

Basicly what a body spray does is:
It makes tiny wounds in the skin tissue, this causes the skin to scar.
This is so that the sweat can’t leave the body, it is forced to keep in the body.
Yes this does means that deospray isn’t the best for you, since sweat is a chemical substance that needs to leave your body.

Read full topic
item.source: How to freeze/burn urself with axe (body spray)
